Authors:
Ruvishika Shehali Jayawardena, Erio Camporesi, Ali H
BAHKALI, JiYe Yan, Kevin D Hyde
Title:
A new species of Colletotrichum from Sonchus sp. in
Italy
Keywords:
molecular phylogeny, morphology, taxonomy, host name,
saprobe
Abstract:
Colletotrichum sonchicola, sp. nov. was collected from
Sonchus sp. (dandelion tribe) in Forl√¨-Cesena Province, Italy, and is
introduced in this paper using morphological and molecular data.
Combined phylogenetic analysis of ITS, GAPDH, CHS, ACT and TUB2 sequence
data demonstrate that C. sonchicola is a distinct species within the
dematium species complex. The new species is illustrated and compared
with related taxa. This provides the first record of a Colletotrichum
species from the genus Sonchus.
